channel.title: Sherry on Need a drink?
channel.description: Recent content in Sherry on Need a drink?

item.title: Artist's special
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 30 ml Scotch
  • 30 ml Oloroso sherry
  • 15 ml lemon juice
  • 15 ml grenadine or redcurrant or raspberry syrup
  • (garnish) lemon twist

Instructions

Shake ingredients with ice. Serve in cocktail glass. Garnish.
